original: intros x y eps H. unfold ball in H. rewrite <- Cmod_2Rmax. assert (Rmax (Rabs (fst (minus y x))) (Rabs (snd (minus y x))) < eps) as Hmax. -- apply AbsRing_norm_compat2 in H. unfold abs in H. simpl in H. unfold minus in H. unfold plus in *. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec (Rabs (fst y - fst x)) (Rabs (snd y - snd x))); auto. simpl in *. destruct (Rle_dec (Rabs (snd y - snd x)) (Rabs (fst y - fst x))); auto. unfold Rmax in l. destruct (Rle_dec (Rabs (snd y - snd x)) (Rabs (fst y - fst x))); simpl in *. apply Rsqrt_lt_Rsqr. right. auto. apply Rsqr_incrst_0. right. auto. apply Rabs_pos. apply Rsqr_incrst_0. left. rewrite <- Ropp_0. rewrite <- (Rplus_0_r (Rabs (snd y - snd x))). apply Ropp_le_contravar. apply Rplus_le_lt_compat; try apply Rabs_pos. unfold Rle. auto. -- apply Rmult_lt_reg_l with (/ sqrt 2). ++ apply Rinv_0_lt_compat. apply sqrt_less_0. auto. ++ rewrite <- Rmult_assoc. rewrite Rinv_l. --- rewrite Rmult_1_l. eapply Rle_lt_trans; try eapply Hmax. apply sqrt_le_1_alt. rewrite Rmult_comm. apply Rmax_r. --- apply sqrt2_neq0.
